channel.title: [RS2 Server]You can't wear that!

item.title: [RS2 Server]You can't wear that!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I am trying to equip an item such as void or a party hat, but the equipment definition is returning null and saying, “You can’t wear that!”

Code:

        if (item.getEquipmentDefinition() == null || item.getEquipmentDefinition().getType() == null) {
            if (getMob().getActionSender() != null) {
                getMob().getActionSender().sendMessage("You can't wear that.");
            }
            return;
        }

EDIT: Fixed

Read full topic
